Title: Relates to requirements for signs providing notice of the use of a photo speed violation monitoring system
Summary: Requires signs providing notice of the use of a photo speed violation monitoring system to be primarily yellow and be placed within fifty feet of a photo speed violation monitoring system.
LawCode: Amd ยง1180-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requirements for signs providing notice of the use of a photo speed violation monitoring system
